alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Teller and western El Paso Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chipita Park, or 11 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodland Park, Manitou Springs, Green Mountain Falls, Crystola, Chipita Park and Cascade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
